tool_description: This API is a QR code generation service built using Flask. It accepts a 'url' parameter in the GET request and returns a PNG image of the generated QR code. The QR code can be saved as an attachment with the filename 'qr_code.png'. The API runs on port 4000 and can be easily integrated into any application or website that needs to generate QR codes.
name: QR Code API_v6
title: QR Code API

api_list.name: QR Code Image Generator
api_list.description: This API is a QR code generation service built using Flask. It accepts a 'url' parameter in the GET request and returns a PNG image of the generated QR code. The QR code can be saved as an attachment with the filename 'qr_code.png'. The API runs on port 4000 and can be easily integrated into any application or website that needs to generate QR codes.
